title: Poolish
steps: In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, water, and yeast.
Stir until well mixed, cover with a clean kitchen towel, and let it sit in a cool place overnight (8-12 hours), or until it passes the drop test.

When ready, the poolish will be bubbly and active. To test if it's ready, drop a spoonful of the poolish into a bowl of water. If it floats, it's ready to use. If it sinks, let it sit for another hour or so and test again.
